text: Fritz Lichtenhahn (6 May 1932 – 24 May 2017) was a Swiss actor. He was born in Arosa, Switzerland. He was known for his movies Alle Jahre wieder: Die Familie Semmeling (1976), Germany, Pale Mother (1980) and Schtonk (1992). Lichtenhahn died on May 24, 2017 in Hamburg, Germany at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Swiss movie actors Category:Swiss stage actors Category:Plessur District Category:People from Graubünden
title: Fritz Lichtenhahn
